alert.note: Alert for Florence (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 12:50PM CST until January 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...BITTER COLD WIND CHILL READINGS EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY MORNING... .An arctic air mass combined with light northwest winds will produce bitter cold wind chill readings of 20 below to 35 below zero tonight into Wednesday morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Bitter cold wind chills expected. Wind chills down to 25 below to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Florence County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
